subject: Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Mikaela Shiffrin, who leads the worldwide slalom rankings and is often referred to as the next Lindsey Vonn, is the first American to win two World Cup races before turning 18.
snippet: Mikaela Shiffrin, who leads the worldwide slalom rankings and is often referred to as the next Lindsey Vonn, is the first American to win two World Cup races before turning 18.
